name: @zowe/secrets-for-zowe-sdk
description: Credential management facilities for Imperative, Zowe CLI, and extenders.
author: Zowe

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && cd src/keyring && napi build --config napi.json --js false --platform --release
scripts.build:debug: cd src/keyring && napi build --config napi.json --js false --platform
scripts.rebuild: npx --yes --package=@napi-rs/cli@2.16.2 -- napi build --config src/keyring/napi.json --cargo-cwd src/keyring --platform --release --js=false src/keyring
